modName: Mirz's NPC Replacer Sorex and Corpulus
summary: This mod edits Sorex Vinius and his father Corpulus Vinius in Winking Skeever.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][font=Verdana][size=4][center]
Mirz's NPC Replacer Sorex and Corpulus[/center][center]
[size=2]
Description
===========

This mod edits [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Sorex_Vinius]Sorex Vinius[/url] and his father [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Corpulus_Vinius]Corpulus Vinius[/url] in Winking Skeever.

Corpulus is Sorex's father, but I think he looks too young compared to him.
Also I made Sorex look more like his father.

Highly recommended to install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?]SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and Real Feet Meshes[/url]
by fadingsignal for best results! (I'm using the younger face textures in my pics)


Details
=======

Sorex:
-New custom face normalmap, eyes, brows and beard
-Changed hair
-Edited face shape
-Changed his weight from 100 to 60
-Forwarded edits from USLEEP

Corpulus:
-New custom face normalmap, facegen textures, detailmap, eyes, brows and beard
-Edited face shape
-Made him older looking
-Very close to vanilla look

Please add screenshots and come back to endorse if you like my mod :)


Incompatibility
===============

Conflict with mods that edits Sorex or Corpulus.


Known Issues or Bugs
====================

-If you have met Sorex before you install this, he might have a neck gap because I changed his weight.
 You can fix it with the console: Walk close to him, open console, click him, type setnpcweight 60, press
 enter, type disable, press enter, type enable, press enter.

Let me know if you find any bugs, so I can try to fix them.


Requirements
============

None


Recommended mods
================

SKSE
ENB
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?]SkySight Skins by fadingsignal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36510/?]Superior Lore-Friendly Hair - HD textures by skyrimaguas [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30533/?]Face to face conversation by towawot [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69784/?]RUSTIC CLOTHING by Gamwich [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX by anamorfus [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31593/?]Mitigate HDR Eye Adaptation and disable Bloom by carpetbulge [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222/?]Immersive HUD - iHUD by Gopher [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63478/?]True Storms - Thunder and Rain Redone by fadingsignal [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75346/?]Natural Lighting Vivid Atmospherics by Megaloblast and Kojak747 [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI by SkyUI Team
[/url]
